Joel.1: What the locust swarm has left other locusts have eaten. The fields are destroyed. Lament, O priests! The day of the LORD is near.
Joel.2: A great army is on the mountains. Return to the LORD for he is merciful. 'Fear not, I will restore you. I will pour out my Spirit.'
Joel.3: 'I will gather all the nations for judgement. For the day of the LORD is near. Jerusalem will be inhabited for all generations.'
